import React from "react"; import "./App.scss"; import { VerticalTimeline, VerticalTimelineElement } from "react-vertical-timeline-component"; import "react-vertical-timeline-component/style.min.css"; import LionIcon from "./LionIcon"; import GogoroIcon from "./GogoroIcon"; import TransIcon from "./TransIcon"; import GermanyIcon from "./GermanyIcon"; import NCHUicon from "./NCHUicon"; import HotelIcon from "./HotelIcon"; import III_icon from "./III_icon"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import { GoMortarBoard } from "react-icons/go"; import { MdWork } from "react-icons/md"; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ title: { color: "#3d4451 !important", marginTop: "0px !important", }, transIot: { color: "#3d4451;", padding: "0px 0px 0px 0px", fontWeight: "bold", fontSize: "18px", marginTop: "-25px !important", }, gogoroName: { color: "#3d4451;", padding: "0px 0px 0px 0px", fontWeight: "bold", fontSize: "18px", marginTop: "-25px !important", }, name: { color: "#3d4451;", padding: "16px 0px 0px 0px", fontWeight: "bold", fontSize: "18px", }, iconstyle: { color: "white", fontSize: "31px", position: "relative", top: "13px", ["@media (max-width: 960px)"]: { top: "7px !important", color: "white !important", position: "relative !important", fontSize: "24px !important" } }, skillList: { padding: "0px", marginTop: "0px", }, ul: { padding: "0px !important", } })); const Timeline = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return (

Work experience & Education

} >

IOV Project Manager

2021/7~2022/2

  • • Imported the GIT version control tool.
  • • People used social media such as WhatsApp or Line to discuss features and to track issues. Imported project management tool {`(‘Click up’)`}.
  • • Hosted a meeting with members to discuss the problem. Reached an agreement to implement a product development process. AGILE. The project went smoothly, and members now willingly communicate with each other.
  • • Advocated MVP concept and built an MVP. The development team can focus on the most valuable feature now. KOLs exposed valuable features to the market two months before the product was launched into the market.

} >

Front end engineer

2019/9~2021/3

  • • Website issue: The battery swap management platform was too old to use. I drove the team as the main Front End Development Engineer. The battery swap management platform has already released and has been in use for two years. Users are satisfied with the platform. The platform can monitor over 2300 battery swap stations in the whole of Taiwan. The system monitors the battery status of the scooters. Maintenance can receive an immediate, urgent alert when the battery swap station has a problem.
  • • App problem: The mobile device’s platform was difficult to operate when FAE was maintaining the battery swap station. Developed a new Battery Swap platform for mobile devices with the team. Improved the user interface and user experience. Enhanced FAEs user experience and the UI. Improved FAE’s working efficiency.
  • Develop Gostation Management System Platform
  • Maintain Gogoro Network Battery Swapping Platform
  • Define and apply interfaces with backend engineers
  • Inter-department collaboration
  • Take part in the project design discussions
  • Responsive Web Design
  • React module development

 } >

Front end engineer

2018/6~2019/9

  • The Ticket/Pass Page of Lion Travel Website
  • React module development
  • jQuery module development
  • Define and apply interfaces with backend engineers
  • Inter-department collaboration
  • Take part in the project design discussions
  • Search engine optimization
  • Responsive Web Design
  • Cross-browser compatibility

 } >

  • Javascript
  • HTML5
  • PHP
  • MySQL
  • Responsive web design

 } >

2016/7~2017/7 Exchange Student

  • Goethe Zertifikat A2
  • Goethe Zertifikat B1

 } >

  • Marketing communications
